apiClassifier.shortdesc: Tesselates an area into several triangles to allow free transform distortion on BitmapData objects.

asCustoms.version:
1.1.0
edit 2
The original Actionscript2.0 version of the class was written by Thomas Pfeiffer (aka kiroukou), inspired by Andre Michelle (andre-michelle.com). Ruben Swieringa rewrote Thomas Pfeiffer's class in Actionscript3.0, making some minor changes/additions.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Tesselates an area into several triangles to allow free transform distortion on BitmapData objects.

apiParam.apiDesc: Width of the image to be processed
Height of image to be processed

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets the precision of this DistortImage instance and re-initializes the triangular grid.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets the precision of this DistortImage instance and re-initializes the triangular grid.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sets the size of this DistortImage instance and re-initializes the triangular grid.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sets the size of this DistortImage instance and re-initializes the triangular grid.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Distorts the provided BitmapData according to the provided Point instances and draws it onto the provided Graphics.

apiParam.apiDesc: Graphics on which to draw the distorted BitmapData
Point specifying the coordinates of the top-left corner of the distortion
Point specifying the coordinates of the top-right corner of the distortion
Point specifying the coordinates of the bottom-right corner of the distortion
Point specifying the coordinates of the bottom-left corner of the distortion

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Distorts the provided BitmapData according to the provided Point instances and draws it onto the provided Graphics.

apiValue.shortdesc: Indicates whether or not use pixelsmoothing in the beginBitmapFill method of the Graphics class.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Indicates whether or not use pixelsmoothing in the beginBitmapFill method of the Graphics class.

apiValue.shortdesc: Horizontal precision of this DistortImage instance.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Horizontal precision of this DistortImage instance. Property can only be set through the class constructor.
Height of this DistortImage instance. Property can only be set through the class constructor.

apiValue.shortdesc: Vertical precision of this DistortImage instance.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Vertical precision of this DistortImage instance. Property can only be set through the class constructor.
Width of this DistortImage instance. Property can only be set through the class constructor.
